website_summaries.verdict: Despite a few small downsides, AKG's $250 on-ear active noise-canceling headphone sounds great and is a worthy alternative to Bose's top-selling QuietComfort 25.
pros: The AKG N60 NC is a compact, comfortable, well-designed on-ear headphone that sounds really good for a model with active noise cancellation
The rechargeable battery offers 30 hours of listening time
cons: Charging cable isn't the standard Micro-USB variety

customer_reviews.title: love the noise canceling feature
customer_reviews.text: I've never experienced noise canceling until this purchase. Pretty fascinating how they work. They are so effective, they could be used to help go to sleep, without playing any music. Just by using the noise canceling feature. These sound great. I am using my cell phone, with a portable battery operated amplifier between phone and these headphones to help make the sound louder. otherwise, these headphones would be too quiet. I use the combination at the gym.
customer_reviews.author: roger bergeron

customer_reviews.title: these are amazing. i used them on a 23 hour train ...
customer_reviews.text: these are amazing. i used them on a 23 hour train trip and they virtually eliminated the sound of the train. great great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Evita Peron

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Frequency Response: 10Hz – 22kHz; Sensitivity: 123dB SPL/V@1kHz, for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Noise cancelling just amazing. Mic functions work great for calls. Love the versatility of working wirless or with ecable when run out of power. Amazing sound for a non over the ears headphones. Easy to pack and fit perfectly on my head. great purchase, very recomended good priced earphones.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Arbelaez

customer_reviews.title: It’s not terribly expensive and yet portable enough for travel
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for an active noise cancelling headphones for travel and I think this fits the bill. It’s not terribly expensive and yet portable enough for travel. It folds up nicely and comes with a slim case. it also fits comfortably and for the noise cancellation, it’s good enough for me. Sound quality wise is also decent. Can’t wait to bring this for my next trip.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Great but for the USB chargng cable !!!
customer_reviews.text: Received my AKG N60nc over the Christmas period. Noise cancellation was excellent, and sonically superior to my old Bose QC25 with the added option of still being able to use them without battery power (and without active noise cancellation.) My major complaint is the non-standard chargng cable. I recommend that you manually mark the signal traces onto a 4-pole 2.5mm sub-mini plug to USB cable in the event you lose the original charging cord.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Rotor

customer_reviews.title: Nice looks, but...
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable headset, easy to use. The quality of sound is good, and the charged battery works for 1-2 weeks without charging. I use them on the half-hour commute home. The drawback is that I don't think the noise-canceling (NC) feature is very effective - I use them on trains in Eastern Europe, and the roar of the train is diminished only slightly, once the NC function is switched on. I was hoping to avoid having to listen to audio-books at almost full volume, but alas. Expensive lesson.
customer_reviews.author: ntar2200

customer_reviews.title: OK. Works as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Jack is 2.5mm. I would have liked a 3.5mm jack that is easier to find. Noise cancelling works. It suppresses ambient sound like chatter and car engine but let through voice Battery duration is exceptional. The headphones are confortable enough even with glasses, still I would have liked an even bigger version since I have a big head. Overall I'm happy with this purchase. In the future I'll consider an around the ears version. Consider buying a 2.5mm to 3.5mm cable when you buy this headphone.
customer_reviews.author: Orso Eric

customer_reviews.title: Really nice, especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is good, not great, with noise cancellation on. A fun sound signature, not super analytic. They don't sound as good without the noise cancellation on. The noise cancellation is good, takes the edge off modern rumble. Comfortable. Not too big, not too small. They seem sturdy. They work well wirelessly (Bluetooth, I'm not sure which protocol) and wired.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, but not durable enough
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I like these quite a bit—a good size for travel, has NC feature (which I rarely use but it's good to have it there), and the audio quality is great. However, they are not durable enough. About one year after purchase the soft surrounds and padding that touch the ears falls apart. One year of use is not good enough for a $120 price tag in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: James Van Arsdale

customer_reviews.title: Good enough for on ear
customer_reviews.text: I will return to large, surrounding/covering the whole ear style. These are more portable for travel which is nice, but the, for me, total foolishness of having to charge with a plug size that is NOT available anywhere whatsoever except online is a mistake I will not repeat. Left my charging cord at home, (and it is MIA still), and had to do without charging for most of a three month trip.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Real sound
customer_reviews.text: On point. If you are looking to get detailed sound. I recommend this product. It fell a little short on my bass expectations though works great. I like the product
customer_reviews.author: John N

customer_reviews.title: Makes a big difference
customer_reviews.text: I love being able to write computer programs without hearing the background noise from my office. I concentrate best when I listen to music without words.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality, noise cancellation stopped working after less than 6 months
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these in June and they've had very light use in the office, only used the noise cancellation feature on a couple flights. Less than six months after purchase, the noise cancellation in the left ear-cup has stopped working completely, and the right ear-cup is extremely loud and boomy when noise cancellation is on. This is not an AKG quality product, save your money and look elsewhere for good headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph A.

customer_reviews.title: Very good Deal!
customer_reviews.text: These sound great, and do a real good job of cancelling noise - they were just used on cross-country flights with great results. Not sure you about battery life, but I am happy so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Noise cancel works super well!
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are nice and light weight. The noise canceling is great! It has a very soft white noise kind of sound when NC is on, it makes it feel like you're under water! They're also really compact, when folded, it fits nicely in my hand. The ear pieces are soft and plushy. Overall I think the specs deserve a Five star. But the headphones are a bit on the smaller side, and on top of having a big head I also wear glasses which didn't make it too comfortable for long use (2-3 hours max). But if you can get past this, I would definitely recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I have used them for a few months. Replaced Bose noise cancelling headphones with these and find them a great value for the price. I plan to purchase a them for my spouse for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Action Family

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and great sound
customer_reviews.text: Ah - now I can work with white noise or great music instead of open office chatter. Comfortable even when I wear all day! Cords are well designed so they’ll hold up and not tangle. Came with a great little flexible zip-up storage case so they’re easy to toss in my work carry all without taking up much space or worrying about damaging them.
customer_reviews.author: julie m

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones!
customer_reviews.text: Wore these on a long flight for the first time and am very happy with the fit and quality !
customer_reviews.author: Kdago

customer_reviews.title: Very good audio quality and excellent noise-cancellation
customer_reviews.text: Very good audio quality and excellent noise-cancellation, but they can get pretty uncomfortable if one wears them for over an hour.
customer_reviews.author: S. A.

customer_reviews.title: They sound pretty good, but they hurt my ears pretty bad ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought these headphones about three months ago. They sound pretty good, but they hurt my ears pretty bad after wearing them for more than a couple of hours. I find myself having to switch to my regular apple headphones because these things are so uncomfortable for long term use.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis K.

customer_reviews.title: Seriously Unimpressed
customer_reviews.text: I think I must have received a faulty set? I can literally hear everything, just slightly muffled, noise cancellation is non existent. These things are Total junk at this point. I am returning them asap.
customer_reviews.author: EO

customer_reviews.title: Someone talking near you is audible and sounds robotic through ...
customer_reviews.text: Someone talking near you is audible and sounds robotic through the music. However generally blocks out a lot of low level background noise.
customer_reviews.author: Lava

customer_reviews.title: Skip these if you wear glasses!
customer_reviews.text: Just returned these. They're not good for glasses wearers, unless your ears are massive... My ears are aching after wearing them for an hour. The top band is heavy on my head. Sound quality is fine, both for sounds and calls, but not as good as another pair I own that cost $20 more. Lack of bluetooth for this cost is also a mark against them. Better luck next time!
customer_reviews.author: Abby K.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value for a well performing headset
customer_reviews.text: Works very well, fits my wife's head perfectly, excellent value for money. So far xo good, but time will tell just how robust it is.
customer_reviews.author: The Road Warrior

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and the price was great.. sound quality is also great and it does its job with the outside noise.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Bass is lacking
customer_reviews.text: Very average, not nearly as good as its counterpart the wireless headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good, not crazy about them.
customer_reviews.text: The sounds is good and the noise cancelling decent as well. I guess good price for money. I am satisfied with them yet not over the moon.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Welles

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional!
customer_reviews.text: Just used these noise canceling headphones on a long flight and they are stunning. Best headphones I have ever owned! Super happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Cari

customer_reviews.title: these are friggin awesome! Comfy
customer_reviews.text: Whoa, these are friggin awesome! Comfy, excellent sound quality & great for travel.
customer_reviews.author: G. Milner

customer_reviews.title: Good for light travel, not long commutes.
customer_reviews.text: These are nice, work well, but don't last more than a year with heavy use. If you only need them for light travel go for it.
customer_reviews.author: Kynon J Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked nicely on our recent international flight; folds down compactly for carry-on
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: But it's so tiny and I think it‘s hard to wear.
customer_reviews.author: XUN

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have a narrow head, but these headphones were too uncomfortably tight. I couldn't wear them.
customer_reviews.author: W. S. Clausing

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound for the price, very good noise cancelling function. Definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best noise cancelling available
customer_reviews.text: I have been a user of the Bose Quiet comfort 15 for a few years now and loved the noise cancelling technology. I was in the market for a new pair when I came across these headphones and I thought Id give it a try. Its a close call, but I can honestly say that the noise canceling on these headphones are superior to bose. I fly frequently for work and have never experienced anything like these before. I couldnt here a thing on any of my flights, it was magical!!!
customer_reviews.author: Connor

customer_reviews.title: Do not hesitate, just buy it.
customer_reviews.text: This is really worth it. Just $150, very good sound and noise cancelling feature.. Best headphone ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Henry Shy

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Incredible value: Great sound quality, super comfortable, great attention to high quality details, and relatively compact.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love a lot about these headphones
customer_reviews.text: I love a lot about these headphones. Noise cancelling is like magic! They started picking up interference from my iphone when the noise canceling is on. I'm not sure if its a defect or a fact of life. It seems to only happen when I have spotty reception though.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Don't have much experience with other brands but I'm pleased with these
customer_reviews.text: Surprised how well the noise cancellation works. Don't have much experience with other brands but I'm pleased with these.
customer_reviews.author: Carr Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones too bad i lost them 1 week after i receiving ...
customer_reviews.author: alexandre pinheiro

customer_reviews.title: Good headphone but alright when it comes to noise cancellation
customer_reviews.text: The headphone is compact and looks nice. I am satisfied with the sound although it sounds a bit lower in volume output. If you are opting for noise cancellation go for something else if not it is a good headphone.
customer_reviews.author: Ujjwal Acharya

customer_reviews.title: Awful balance.
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I have got a dud pair, but I can hear background music very loudly but can't hear voices at all, hence making these useless for watching movies. I can't see any way to adjust the balance. When I turn on the noise cancelling feature, things are even worse, with a low level hum all the time.
customer_reviews.author: callum

customer_reviews.title: Not wireless, quality so so, NC not good
customer_reviews.text: Advertised as wireless, was wired only. Jack was Iphone sized only. Quality seemed OK, but noise cancelation was not good.
customer_reviews.author: J C

product_meta.title: AKG Noise Canceling Headphone Black (N60)
product_meta.description: Hear no evil. The AKG n60nc headphones deliver Grammy award-winning AKG superior sound while also utilizing best in class active noise cancelling to minimize the disruptive sounds encountered on everything from planes to trains. This newest member of the flight line-up will rock your world continuously with up to 30 hours of battery life. And if immersing yourself in your music for a long period of time is the goal, the n60nc can still be used in passive mode after the battery Dies out. Accented with premium material such as aluminum, memory foam and leather, this unparalleled listening experience comes magnificently packaged in elegantly crafted lightweight headphones that provide both viewing and listening pleasure. In addition, this Ultra premium audio offering comes complete with first-class Features like an exclusive 3d-axis folding mechanism, a fully-accessorized travel package, a one button universal remote/mic cable and a USB charging cable. The AKG N60 NC utilizes the standard (Bluetooth receiver) high quality stereo audio listening, not the Bluetooth protocol one for Headset Audio which is used for talking on the phone.
feature_bullets: Reduces ambient noise especially when traveling to create a perfect sound environment where you can be alone with your music and yourself
Designed for convenient transport and storage thanks to the 3D folding mechanism and the carrying case, you can get up and go with your music at the drop of a high hat
Thanks to the 30 hours battery life and the convenient USB charging cable, the N60NC can be enjoyed all the way (and back)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars323 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
